attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to reduce numbers in jails, Forced labour could be introduced. An ideal scenario would be for criminals to man a galley and row back and forth to France. This would reduce greenhouse gases caused by ferries, give the prisoners some exercise and empty prisons.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
